headline: How Morgan Stanley’s Downgrade and Guidance Cut Will Impact Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM) Investors
summary: Morgan Stanley recently downgraded Archer-Daniels-Midland from Equalweight to Underweight, citing persistent underperformance in its Crushing unit, ample global supplies, trade uncertainties, and delays in Renewable Volume Obligation decisions, while the company cut full-year EPS guidance to US$3.25–US$3.50 despite a prior quarterly earnings beat. At the same time, Archer-Daniels-Midland maintained its 94-year streak of uninterrupted dividend payments, underscoring management’s commitment to...
